Speaker: Dr. Otto Octavius
Text: Technology is the light that can cut through the darkness. When humanity conforms to a single truth, a truth based in technical progress and scientific method, we will be unstoppable. I, doctor Otto Octavius, vow as a scientist and businessman that my duties to humankind will be fulfilled. Thank you. Thank you.
[The crowd applauds.]

Speaker: Peter Parker
Text: Yeah nice words Octavius. If these executives knew you the way I do, I wonder if they'd be so quick to applaud.

Speaker: Eddie Brock
Text: Just keep shooting Eddie. When J. Jonah Jameson sees these photos my career is going be right back on track.
[Meanwhile, behind the scenes ...]

Speaker: Security Guard 1
Text: Check one, where's your twenty?

Speaker: Security Guard 2
Text: Dispatch H, all is…
[The guard is dragged away. The figure, shrouded in darkness, adroitly takes out the other guards.]

Speaker: Dr. Otto Octavius
Text: Who dares? Face me coward, face a worthy foe. Spider-man?
[Spider-man comes on the scene.]

Speaker: Peter Parker
Text: Last time I checked, I was Spider-man.

Speaker: Eddie Brock
Text: Spider-man, what's he doing?
[He apparently steals the invention of Octavius.]

Speaker: Peter Parker
Text: Gotta get into my costume and take out this imposter. Can't get free of this crowd.

Speaker: Eddie Brock
Text: Can't get a shot. Jameson would pay any price to get this kind of dirt on Spider-man.
[Rushing through the crowd, Peter accidentally run into Eddie.]

Speaker: Peter Parker
Text: That was Eddie Brock.

Speaker: Eddie Brock
Text: Who the? He looked familiar. Whatever, stay focused. He's stealing Octavuis' device. Oh no, he sees me.
[The impostor Spider-man shoots a web in Eddie's camera and smashes it.]

Speaker: Eddie Brock
Text: My camera, noooooo. Ah it's over, it's all over. I blew it again, I can hear Jameson's voice already.

Speaker: Imaginary J Jonah Jameson
Text: Brock, you loser. If I had given a real photographer that job I would finally have the evidence to send Spider-man away forever. You're through Brock. When I am done with you, you won't be able to get a job taking wedding pictures in Siberia.

Speaker: Eddie Brock
Text: I tried to fight it, can't fight him anymore.
[Eddie turns to Venom.]

Speaker: Venom
Text: Again innocence falls prey to the evil of Spider-man. Rest easy Brock, Venom is here, and if it's the last thing we ever do, Jameson and the insect are going pay.
[Meanwhile in the secret laboratory...]

Speaker: Doctor Octopus
Text: Phase one complete, let us begin phase two.

Speaker: Carnage
Text: Hehehehehe yes it begins hahahahaha very soon.
[Out of the open pipes, a dense green gas emerges, covering the city to the roofs.]

Speaker: Doctor Octopus and Carnage
Text: Hahahahahahahaha.
[The camera flies over the city, immersed in fog. In background, we hear the voice of Stan Lee.]

Speaker: Stan Lee
Text: Welcome true believers and newcomers alike! Spider-man co-creator Stan Lee here. Once again we find our hero Peter Parker, better known around the world is the amazing Spider-man and the heat and trouble. But this is just the beginning Spidey fans! So get ready for a true superhero action thriller, packed to the brim with throws and chills, twists and turns! More super villains that you can shoot a web at, and, of course, nonstop web-slinging, wall-crawling action!
[The camera focuses on one of the buildings where we meet our hero, Spider-man and his friend - Black Cat.]

Speaker: Black Cat
Text: Hey, spider!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Hey, Black Cat! What's going on?

Speaker: Black Cat
Text: I know there's been some trouble but the banks being robbed and they've got hostages! Use your spidey compass to get to the bank quickly.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Thanks, Cat.
[Spidey starts walking through the roof.]

Speaker: Black Cat
Text: Hey Spider-man! Come over here. When the building is close enough you can swing to it. Press the Jump Button and then press and hold the R2 button while in the air to swing.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: What's up, Cat?

Speaker: Black Cat
Text: Spidey! That's a web cartridge. You can carry up to 10 of them.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Spider sense tingling... That's going on here?
[Spidey sees an armed thug.]

Speaker: Black Cat
Text: Hold it, Spider! He doesn't look friendly. You can kick, punch or use your web attack to get pass.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: I doubt that it hurts me more that it hurts you.
[On the next building...]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Wow, police choppers.

Speaker: Black Cat
Text: Can't believe they shot down those police choppers.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Yeah, just my luck. I'll probably get blamed for that too. Is that the bank ahead?

Speaker: Black Cat
Text: Yes, but be careful, Spider. I saw the chopper dropping off armed robbers on top of the bank.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Thanks for the heads up, Cat.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: I bet I can get into the bank through the top of this building! Cat was right. It's the Jade syndicate.
[After beating up all the thugs...]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: That's the last one. Hope the hostages is still all right.
[Spidey jumps into the bank.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Oh, I hope they don't mind if I make a quick deposit.
[He kicks some ass.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: I doubt that really hurt me more than it hurt you. Ha ha ha! They do have hostages! Have to make sure they don't get hurt. Looks like that room there controls the security doors, locked from the inside. There's gotta be another way in. It looks like these switches can open the security doors. Huh, going down… Mind if i drop in?

Speaker: Thug
Text: That's going on up there?

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Hah... I make this look easy. Oh, more hostages and a bomb! I have to be really careful here. Huh... big safe.

Speaker: Thug
Text: They're messing with us! Start the timer on the bomb and take out all the hostages.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: The robbers have been taken care of but what can I do about the bomb? Think, Spidey, think!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Not this time, guys!

Speaker: Stan Lee
Text: Oh-oh, Spidey, Scorpion's headed out for old J. Jonah Jameson from day one, blaming Jameson for being stuck in his scorpion suit. Spidey had better get there quickly or JJJ may end up in the obituaries of his own paper.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Follow my spidey compass.

Speaker: J Jonah
Text: Get away, Gargan!

Speaker: Scorpion
Text: Your time is running out!

Speaker: Thug
Text: Hey, keep your eyes open. The sooner we take out Spider-man the sooner the boss pays us.

Speaker: Spider-man (after beating a thug)
Text: Oh, yeah! Hope Jonah is still alive.

Speaker: Spider-man (after beating a thug)
Text: Easy as pie.

Speaker: Spider-man (after beating a thug)
Text: Huh, I'm sorry about that.
[Spidey gets to the Daily Bugle building on time.]

Speaker: J. Jonah
Text: Listen Gargan, it's a new millennium! Lots of high tech there. Maybe some way we can get you out of that suit.

Speaker: Scorpion
Text: You put me in this suit! Now I'm going to make you pay.

Speaker: J Jonah
Text: Get over it Gargan!

Speaker: Scorpion
Text: You ruin my life so now I'll end yours.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Leave them alone, chuckles!

Speaker: Scorpion
Text: Butt out, webhead.

Speaker: J Jonah
Text: Spider-man! I asked for the police and I get this?
[Spider-man fights Scorpion.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: That'll be OK. Oh, you want some more?
[J Jonah finds a moment to escape.]

Speaker: J Jonah
Text: I'm out of here.
[Scorpion tries to follow J. Jonah, but Spidey finish him off.]

Speaker: J Jonah
Text: I don't know what you're trying to pull by saving my life but it won't work.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Oh you're just too clever for me JJ.
[The police appears.]

Speaker: J Jonah
Text: There he is officers, a man behind the science Expo heist. Shoot him now! Shoot him!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: JJ out of the wheel. I mean it this time!
[Spidey escape through the window. On the roof of one of the buildings he meets Daredevil.]

Speaker: Daredevil
Text: Hold it Spider-man! I don't want to believe that you pulled off the heist today, but I've got to make sure.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Daredevil, I haven't got time to explain.

Speaker: Daredevil
Text: Just tell me your side of it. I'll know if you're lying.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: How am I supposed to know you're the real Daredevil?

Speaker: Daredevil
Text: What?

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Listen, it's true a Spider-man made off with Octavius's new invention, but not the Spider-man, not me. Somebody's framed me. Why? I don't know yet and if New York's finest catch me it may be too late.

Speaker: Daredevil
Text: Well then you'd better get going. NYPD is coming fast.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: That's it? You believe me?

Speaker: Daredevil
Text: I don't have to believe you I know you aren't lying.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: But how?

Speaker: Daredevil
Text: Let's just say you've got your superpowers and I've got mine. I'll spread the word about your innocence. Not that it'll help with the cops. Good luck.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: This one I haven't... Oh-oh...
[A police helicopter appears behind Spidey’s back. Spidey run for his life.]

Speaker: Helicopter pilot
Text: Stay there you are, Spider-man!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: You have the wrong guy!
[The helicopter start shooting and firing rockets.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: That was close!

Speaker: Helicopter pilot
Text: Stand there you are and put you hands behind your head!
[Spidey gets to the building and climbs it. The helicopter continues to fire.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Wow!

Speaker: Helicopter pilot
Text: Hold right there!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: These guys are relentless!

Speaker: Helicopter pilot
Text: Where is he? He moves too fast! Where did he go? Got him in my sights. Taking the shot. Ah, negative one shot!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Don’t stop now Spidey!
[Spidey climbs onto the building and continues to run away from the helicopter.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Wow! Stealing isn’t my style! Moving! Moving! Moving! Man, Mary Jane was right. I need to stay home today. Whoa!
[Spidey gets to a huge metal building and climbs on it.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Enough with the shooting already!

Speaker: Helicopter pilot
Text: Where'd he go? Taking the shot. Ah, negative one shot!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: How tall is this thing?

Speaker: Helicopter pilot
Text: He moves too fast!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Looks like I’m on my way out.
[Spidey climbs onto the concrete block hanged on a hawser, but the helicopter fires a missile into it. The block falls, but Spidey manages to release a web and jump on the near building.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: “Monsters infest sewers!”. Ha-ha, yeah. Keep movin’, Spidey!

Speaker: Pilot
Text: Impact! The transmitter tower.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Hey, you're gonna pay for that tower? Spider-sense tinkling... One more step and that's load of web fluid sticking you to that wall!

Speaker: Black Cat
Text: Well, it's not the most romantic proposition I've ever had

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Black Cat? Oh, I'm so glad it's you.

Speaker: Black Cat
Text: Good to see you too big boy, but you got a problem. Venom's got control of the jumbotron in Times Square. He's been ranting for hours with a message for you.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Venom's ugly face on that big screen? Now that's scary.

Speaker: Black Cat
Text: That's not all. Rhinos on a rampage over Omnitech as well.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: What is this? The bad guys Olympics? Look, Times Square is on the way to Omnitech. Let's find out what Venom is up to then we'll tackle Rhino.

Speaker: Venom
Text: Hahahaha! The Venom marathon continues on the biggest TV in New York. We shoot now to the whole big rotten apple here, people! Hahaha.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Sad thing he’ll probably get his own talk show for this.

Speaker: Venom
Text: So we've got this beautiful brunette here. You know her, she's one of those famous bimbos. We have decided that this poor little lassie has 24 hours to live. 24 hours! Oh, by the way her name is Mary Jane Parker! Hahaha!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: No! Mary Jane…

Speaker: Venom
Text: So just in case someone… yeah you know who it could be… if any of you tight wearing freaks out there wanna save little Miss Fashion Model, then... bring it on! Meanwhile, new yorkers, the venom marathon will continue!

Speaker: Black Cat
Text: Listen, I realize what this means… forget about helping me.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Rhino by yourself? Thanks cat but no thanks. look being Spider-man has given me a lot and taken a lot away, but one thing never changes. My responsibility to use my powers for others before myself, no matter what the cost. There are innocent people at Omnitech and they need our help right now. I won't let them down. Then I'll stop Venom. And this time… it’ll be the last time.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: We're too late! That makes two major technology heists in two days.

Speaker: Black Cat
Text: That makes one question… There’s Rhino? Ugh!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: CAT!

Speaker: Rhino
Text: Well… Isn’t it a bug boy?

Speaker: Stan Lee
Text: Oh, boy, Spidey fans, the Black Cat is out! Rhinos looking to take Spidey down as well!
[Spidey fights Rhino and defeats him.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Oh-oh, spider sense tingling... the boys in blue again. Better hide. Best seat in the house. Octavius! What's he doing here?

Speaker: Octavius
Text: Please, stand back officers. Allow me.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Doc Ock helping the police? Maybe he is reformed. Ock’s taking care of Rhino. I need to find out what happened to Black Cat. This is a job for Peter Parker, not Spider-man.
[Next scene. Peter sees as the Black Cat is taken away by an ambulance.]

Speaker: Peter Parker
Text: Hey, wait. Cat! It's Peter.

Speaker: Back Cat
Text: Peter… You gotta help me… They’re not really parame…

Speaker: Unseen driver
Text: Perfect… perfect…

Speaker: Strange man on passenger seat
Text: Yeees!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Well, that's my story Johnny.

Speaker: Human Torch
Text: Looks like you're in a lot of trouble. You'll find Venom.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: But how? venom is invisible to my spider-sense.

Speaker: Human Torch
Text: Knowing your luck Venom will find you. Have faith, Spidey!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Or could she be... Gotta find her! I don’t have a choice.

Speaker: Venom
Text: Hahahahaha! Well, well, well, what a wuss! Hey, wanna race? Parker hates it then I’ve got the drop on him!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: I hate then he gets the drop on me!

Speaker: Venom
Text: Hurry up, Parker!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Move it Spidey, move it! Gotta keep moving. Got to keep up!

Speaker: Venom
Text: Quit slacking, boy! Come on, Parker!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Look out lady!

Speaker: Lady
Text: Oh my goodness!

Speaker: Venom
Text: Out of my way nerd! Eeh, watch that first step Parker, it's a doozy!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Oh, my head! Look out lady!

Speaker: Lady
Text: Oh my goodness!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: No, sorry, I didn’t see your thing. Can't lose him!

Speaker: Venom
Text: If you wanna fight, follow me. Where’d spider-wuss go? SPIDER-WUSS! Come out and play! Tag!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Come back here, Venom! Where are you?

Speaker: Venom
Text: Now you see me, now you don't. Not too far, Spider! Spidey, where are you?

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Got something for you!
[Spidey defeats Venom. He opens a manhole and escape to sewers.]

Speaker: Venom
Text: Laying down on the job? Heh heh heh.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Where's my wife you symbiote freak! You can run Venom, but you can't hide! Those things... These guys must be leftovers from one of the Lizard's experiments. I'm trapped! I'm sorry guys, am I late for the party?
[He walks to a huge door. Venom is on the other side of it.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Open this door!

Speaker: Venom
Text: Who is thiiiiis? Ha ha ha!
[The door opens. Spidey continue to pursue Venom to the subway.]

Speaker: Venom
Text: Hang on, Parker! Mary Jane's at the next stop.
[Spidey fighting the lizards at the top of a train. Suddenly Venom appears behind his back.]

Speaker: Venom
Text: Mwahahaha!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Oh no!
[Venom hit him in the face. Spidey flies back into the sewers.]

Speaker: Venom
Text: You've got to stop FALLING for us, Parker!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Where am I now? What do we have here? Oh great...

Speaker: Venom
Text: Hohoho!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Looks like I'd better time this right.

Speaker: Venom
Text: Coming through! Stop sweating in here, Parker!  Tasty!
Action: (hits Spidey from behind) (grabs and licks him)

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Lizard! I knew it!

Speaker: Lizard
Text: Spider-man! Venom has imprisoned me and has taken my lair. Now he used my lizardman against you.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: No.

Speaker: Lizard
Text: She also imprisoned that Parker woman.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Where is she?

Speaker: Lizard
Text: She's in the lair at the end of the maze. There is only one way to get there. Go back along this tunnel and cross over to waterways. At the third waterway go right. Follow it around the corners, past the machinery, skip the first tunnel intersection then go right at the next one. You will find the woman there.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Thanks, Lizard.

Speaker: Venom
Text: Aha! Ugh, you're hot, baby! My, my, my... said the spider to the... smaller spider!
[Spidey finds Lizard's Laur occupied by Venom and hear the screams of his wife.]

Speaker: Mary Jane
Text: Heeelp! Is anybody there?

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Mary Jane!

Speaker: Mary Jane
Text: Help me, please!

Speaker: Venom
Text: You made it.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Venom!

Speaker: Venom
Text: I’d like you see your wifey... but she’s in the bed right now!
[Venom pull the switch with his web. The water in Mary Jane’s cell begin to rise.]

Speaker: Mary Jane
Text: Aah! Ahh! No! Please!

Speaker: Venom
Text: So, what do you say… Spongy? Let's finish this.
[A tense fight begins! Mary Jane's life hangs in the balance.]

Speaker: Venom
Text: Brains! Yummy! Not too far little spider!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Gross!

Speaker: Venom
Text: Get back here!  Oh, Spider-man help me, I'm drowning!
[Finally Spidey defeat his sworn enemy.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Why, Venom, why? Why do you come back?! (hits him]

Speaker: Venom
Text: You should know Spider-man. The heist at the Science Expo… you are the bad guy this time!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: You idiot!  Think, Eddie, think! Back to that day.... I was with you in the crowd! The imposter Spider-man was on stage, he burned both of us! And now we’re playing against each other.

Speaker: Venom
Text: You are right, Parker…
[The chain that holds Mary Jane breaks.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Mary Jane!

Speaker: Venom
Text: I've got ya! You and your wife are innocent, Parker. Our bad.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Our bad? OUR BAD?! I'm gonna kill you!

Speaker: Mary Jane
Text: Peter Parker! Just get me out of here, NOW!

Speaker: Venom
Text: Bummer. You're in the doghouse now, dude.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Coming, honey!
[Next scene. Roofs.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: So... we’re partners… but only for now! After we bust those tech thieves, It's payback time for kidnapping my wife.

Speaker: Venom
Text: Geez… one simple mistake. We said we're sorry.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Whatever... now… the impostor was a shapeshifter. That means it was Mysterio or the Chameleon.

Speaker: Venom
Text: Hey! Chameleon was OUR idea! We’re thought of that!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Think of this Einstein. Who could've wanted to steal Octavius' technology?

Speaker: Venom
Text: Oooh oh, we know, we know.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Who?

Speaker: Venom
Text: The Submariner.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Submariner? Get serious will ya.

Speaker: Venom
Text: The mighty Thor.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Are you out of your mind? Don't answer that.

Speaker: Venom
Text: Galactus.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Forget it Eddie. I need Jameson's help on this. We're going to the Bugle.

Speaker: Venom
Text: Jameson? We hate Jameson.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: You bonehead, we're not going to see Jameson, we're going to use his computer database.

Speaker: Venom
Text: Oooooh are we going surf the web?

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Let's just go, okay?
[Spidey and Venom swings to the Bugle.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Here it is, the records room.

Speaker: Venom
Text: Surf the web, surf the web.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Shut up Brock, we don't have time.

Speaker: Venom
Text: Parker wait. Could it be?

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Could what?

Speaker: Venom
Text: Yes, we sense our other.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Who, sense who?

Speaker: Venom
Text: It's our other, the symbiote known as Carnage. We must stop him.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Now?!

Speaker: Venom
Text: Yes, now. We have no choice.
[Venom breaks a window and leaves.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Great. Make more noise, I'm only breaking and entering here. Spider sense tingling, now what? Spidey whoever's behind all this, symbiotes.
[He sees some purple, ooze like creatures.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: This symbiotes must be looking for humans hosts...

Speaker: Stan Lee
Text: Plunging in the battle with symbiotes other than Carnage and Venom? And hostages? Oh, webhead got his work cut out for him today!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Never seen the place this empty.

Speaker: Hostage 1
Text: I've got to get out of here!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Oh yeah... I bet there are no symbiote in here either... If you turn on the air-conditioning the fan will break me free.

Speaker: Hostage 2
Text: Thank you for saving me!
[All hostages are saved.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: These symbiotes are everywhere! They seem to be coming from the basement...
[Spidey jump into an elevator shaft.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: There they'll coming from?! The elevator stopped... Ah, the elevator starting again. I'd better try the other door. Oh, a simbiote generator! So this is how the symbiotes are being created. There's one down. Just one more. Adding this to my webbing will make it burn. I think if this is the last one. But there is more downstairs. My trap webbing doesn't seem to work on these guys. I've got to find out what's going on downstairs.
[He open a door a gets to the basement.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: The basement of the Daily Bugle. Whoever's controlling the generator has got to be down here. That's cool. It's not the heat, it's the humidity. Whoa, where'd he come from?
[Spidey destroys all the generators.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Hey! The impostor!

Speaker: Impostor
Text: Hey! The impostor!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Come back here! That's the guy who framed me. And the one who stole the technology!
[He chases the impostor to the next room.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: I gotta say, you look just like me except you're more angry back alley than friendly neighborhood.

Speaker: Impostor Spider-man
Text: Ooh, for decades I've wanted to shut that mouth of yours. Finally, that time is upon me…
[Transforms into giant version of Mysterio.]

Speaker: Mysterio
Text: ...and now I will crush you once and for all! Hahahahaha! Now, little spider, you will die!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Heh, is it too late for us to be friends?

Speaker: Mysterio
Text: Welcome to your nightmare, Spider-man!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: These glowing conduits is the source of his power. I need to get rid of them all with my web to take him out.

Speaker: Mysterio
Text: You shall not escape me!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Ohh, look at me look at me! I am the master of illusion!

Speaker: Mysterio
Text: Oh, careful now! You are no match for me. You think you've beaten me? Think again, Spider-man!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: That will burst your bubble, Mysterio! Well, Mysterio… the bigger they are, the harder they fall! You working for the wrong people, Mysterio!
[Mysterio defeated.]

Speaker: Mysterio
Text: Nooooooooooo!!
[Spidey grabs him and lift over the floor.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Right now you're thinking, if only you'd taken that giant act to Vegas instead.

Speaker: Mysterio
Text: Curse your endless babble, Spider-man!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Speaking of babble… let's hear it. Who's behind all this?

Speaker: Mysterio
Text: I'll never tell you. Mysterio may be defeated, but the symbiote invasion cannot be stopped.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Symbiote invasion… there are more of them?!

Speaker: Mysterio
Text: You fool, there will be more than you can imagine. That fog which blankets the city is preparing everyone in New York for symbiosis.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: You're the fool Mysterio. Where are they coming from?

Speaker: Mysterio
Text: Go then, on the waterfront, warehouse 65, the secret passage. If only I could watch them destroy you.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Whoever your boss is, he's off his rocker. No one can control the symbiotes.

Speaker: Mysterio
Text: Correction. No one before now.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Spare me the propaganda. Okay, this isn't a game Mysterio. The symbiotes will destroy everything in their path unless I can stop them.
[Someone appears to be watching Spidey from the roofs...]

Speaker: Voice 1
Text: I'm here Frank. What's up?

Speaker: Voice 2
Text: Spider-man's here, Microchip.

Speaker: Microchip
Text: What range?

Speaker: Punisher
Text: One hundred yards maybe, easy shot.

Speaker: Microchip
Text: Very funny, Frank.

Speaker: Punisher
Text: Eh, he spotted me. But how could he? I lost him.

Speaker: Microchip
Text: What happened?

Speaker: Punisher
Text: He took out my scope.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Hey tough guy. Sorry about that expensive lens... Punisher.

Speaker: Punisher
Text: Something tells me we have the same objective here. That's the place, warehouse 65. We can team up, you cover my back.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Huh, no thanks mister death wish. I'd like to keep the body count low if you don't mind.

Speaker: Punisher
Text: Fair enough.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Punisher's guns can't solve this problem. Gotta play this one my way.

Speaker: Stan Lee
Text: Ah, the cliche seedy waterfront warehouse. Although I'm guessing that this particular warehouse has a bit more in store for the webhead than even he can imagine.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Oooh... more symbiotes. Looks like the old Spidey luck is holding out. Looks like I've got to clean this place up too. Haven't been using this Spider Armor much before... Could be useful here. Aha! A secret passage. More generators! I'll have to go. That's it for the generators. Time to get to the BOTTOM of this! Enormous ventilation shaft... There must be something big down there. I like to concrete the dripping water, very nice. Spider Sense tingling! Ah, the old, trusty Spider Armor... I think this is it.
[He jumps down the vent shaft.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Ohh, what a rash! The hell are we? You've got to be kidding... Okay, recap. A couple hundred of feet underwater, electrified floors and walls AND there's these turrets pointing straight at me! Uh-huh, my day just keeps getting better and better! Hey, you could put someone's eye out with that. Who built this place? I'm getting a feeling somebody doesn't want me here. The heating bill for this place must be enormous. Okay! Quit shooting the lasers! What is this place? This must be where the fog is coming from. Who is behind all this? Looked! Let's the door number two. We have a winner.
[Inside the room he sees the Black Cat. She sits in an electric cage.]

Speaker: Black Cat
Text: Spider-man! I'm so happy to see you.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Black Cat? What are you do... who's behind... what's going on here?!

Speaker: Black Cat
Text: Your guess is as good as mine. The guys in the ambulance must have drugged me because the next thing I knew I woke up here. You've got to get me out of here.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Okay, Cat, but how?

Speaker: Black Cat
Text: If you can somehow shut down the power, I can escape.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: You've got it Cat.
[He enters the control room.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Bingo! If I read this right, this panel controls the exhaust ports. If I can jam the exhaust ports without stopping the flow of fog it'll be like a banana in a tailpipe. That ought to blow the power too!
[Spidey begins to block the pipes with flaps...]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Step in the right direction, but not enough pressure. Almost! Sucker is ready to blow! Yes, that does it!
[The fog pipes explodes. Electricity turns off and the Black Cat gets out of the cage.]

Speaker: Black Cat
Text: Thanks, Spider. Whatever you did it worked.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Hey, what else is the Spider-man for? You go get some help, Cat. I'll find out who's behind all this.

Speaker: Black Cat
Text: You got it. I'll be back.
[He walks into a nearby door.]

Speaker: Voice
Text: Hehehehehe.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Listen, whoever you are, no one can control the symbiotes, no one.

Speaker: Voice
Text: I need not control the symbiotes, Spider-man.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Doc Ock?

Speaker: Doctor Octopus
Text: We will work as one. It's a new world. Humanity needs the skills that my technology will get them, symbiosis is the only way.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: I should've known a reformed Doc Ock was too good to be true.

Speaker: Doctor Octopus
Text: A perfect world order. Those who cannot share my vision will be crushed by it.

Speaker: Venom
Text: Speaking of crushed.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Huh?

Speaker: Venom
Text: It's showtime, freaks. Oooh, I smell bad symbiote and it ain't me.

Speaker: Carnage
Text: Bring it on, grandpa.
[They begin to fight each other.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Alone at last.

Speaker: Doctor Octopus
Text: Let us end this Spider-man.
[They start to fight.]

Speaker: Doctor Octopus
Text: You'll never get past my barriers, Spider-man.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: He's right! I need to find some way to draw power away from the shields. Yes! These shields draw power from his. But I need to draw more power!

Speaker: Doctor Octopus
Text: Whatever you will try is useless against my command.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: It's working! One more should do it. That's it! Time to pay the piper off! Uh-huh, looks like his shield is regenerating.

Speaker: Doctor Octopus
Text: You will never destroy me! What are you doing? Stop that! Oh, I am defeated! The end, this plan.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: One down, one to go. I wonder how Venom's doing.

Speaker: Venom
Text: Arrrrrrr.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Eddie, are you alright? Talk to me, wake up Brock.

Speaker: Venom
Text: Look out Parker, behind you.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: What'd you say?

Speaker: Carnage
Text: Ahahahahaha.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: That's a sonic bubble in the middle of the room. This the only two things symbiotes hate - fire and sonics. I’m guessing Ock build this just in case Carnage tried to double-cross him.

Speaker: Carnage
Text: What color do you bleed Spider-man?

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Your plan is doomed, Carnage. Hey! Not enough for ya? I took care of Doc Ock… now I took care of you! Once I stop you, I stop your evil plan.

Speaker: Carnage
Text: Aahh! The pain! THE PAIN!!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: You are a born loser Cletus Cassidy. Like I told Mysterio, no one can control the symbiotes, no one I've met anyway.
[Cletus’ symbiote lurked in a drainpipe.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Take a breather Spidey, it's over. Well just another day in the life... woah. What the?
[Mechanical tentacles drag him down the floor.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Is that Ock?
[It looks like the symbiote has merged with unconscious Octavius.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: It’s gonna blow! I’ve got to get out of here!
[He begins to destroy the laboratory in rage. Spidey runs to the exit. Monster Ock chasing him.]

Speaker: Monster Ock
Text: DIE!!

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Stay away from me! Getting closer to the surface. Level three... it’s two to go. Crushes this very building… Can't shake him! He breathing down my neck! Back off! Level two! Almost there. Level one! I'm the home stretch, baby!
[Spidey manage to swing out of the exploding laboratory.]

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Move it, move it. Oh no... Ock. After all that, it was the symbiote that saved Ock. You've gotta be kidding. A perfect end to a perfect day. Huh, what the?
[The plane arrives with Venom, Captain America and the Black Cat on board.]

Speaker: Venom
Text: Grab on.

Speaker: Captain America
Text: It's a good thing Black Cat gave me a call, son.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Looks like just in time.

Speaker: Venom
Text: Hey Spidey, can you get us Captain America's autograph?

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Oh brother.
[Next scene. Superheroes are playing poker...]

Speaker: Captain America
Text: Punisher, do you have any threes?

Speaker: Punisher
Text: Go fish. So nice of you to join us for once, Spidey.

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Oh I'm sorry, I was out saving the world. Beating you guys at cards out of be pretty easy.

Speaker: Daredevil
Text: Your spider sense won't save you here.

Speaker: Punisher
Text: Look who's talking Daredevil, you've been looking at my cards all night.

Speaker: Daredevil
Text: I don't need to look at your cards Punisher, your bluffs are so obvious.

Speaker: Captain America
Text: Okay, Okay, let's keep this a nice friendly clean game.

Speaker: Punisher
Text: Uh, who keeps inviting this guy?

Speaker: Spider-man
Text: Hey will you guys keep it down?

Speaker: Human Torch (dancing)
Text: Hey! Loosen up kids, I'm on fire.
[Meanwhile supervillians are get that they deserved! Prison.]

Speaker: Scorpion
Text: Wait, hold on, time out. All of you guys were working together and you still couldn't take down Spider-man?

Speaker: Mysterio
Text: Ha it's not my fault. Doc Ock's plan was horrible, everyone knows you can't control the symbiotes.

Speaker: Rhino
Text: Hey wait, so I'm a Rhino, You're a Scorpion, and he's an Octopus. What's a Mysterio?

Speaker: Scorpion
Text: So Rhino, you got any threes?

Speaker: Rhino
Text: Uh hey hey I got a bingo. Haha, you guys think you're so smart but I won. Ha who's your daddy, Doc Ock? Hahaha victory is mine. You're always laughing at me but who's crying now, huh? Wait a minute, I made a mistake.
